overview: Prior to joining the ReputationDefender team and before he attended the Stanford Graduate School of Business, Owen Tripp created the user intelligence team at eBay Inc., helping pioneer systems for identity management, next generation product finding, and keyword search optimization. Mr. Tripp has deep experience with Internet search technologies, data mining, and analytical marketing. Before coming to eBay, Owen Tripp worked at Accenture in the US and in the Philippines.
